content: I think I'll try to demo both the Arione and Antares saddles to see which one feels more comfortable for me. I've heard great things about Fizik saddles, and I'm curious to see how they'll perform on my Trek Emonda. Do you think I should also consider upgrading my handlebars or grips while I'm at it? I've been noticing some discomfort in my hands and wrists during longer rides.
